    • Uses of SigmaSimulatorOutput in edu.biu.scapi.interactiveMidProtocols.sigmaProtocol

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      SigmaSimulatorOutput SigmaSimulator.simulate(SigmaCommonInput input)
      Chooses random challenge and computes the simulator computation.
      SigmaSimulatorOutput SigmaSimulator.simulate(SigmaCommonInput input, byte[] challenge)
      Computes the simulator computation.
